text:
Nikolai Nikolayevich Evreinov (; February 13, 1879 - September 7, 1953) was a Russian theatre director, dramatist and theatre practitioner. He was associated with the art movement known as Russian Symbolism.
"The Storming of the Winter Palace".
In 1920, Evreinov organised the mass spectacle "The Storming of the Winter Palace".

annotations.surface_form: The Storming of the Winter Palace
